name: EnglishProficiency
title: English Proficiency
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of English proficiency.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an indication of ability to communicate in english.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for English Proficiency.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating English Proficiency.)

contains.display: How well do you speak English [NLAAS]
How well do you read english [NLAAS]
How well do you write in english [NLAAS]
How well do you speak English [SAMHSA]
Do you have difficulty communicating, reading, or do you have limited proficiency in English [HHS.ACA Section 4302.ONC]
